data.title: Blue Kite Cinema – Nick Wilson
data.text:
Some of our favorite projects BLUE KITE CINEMA is an award-winning film and commercial production company from the tag-team duo of writer-director Nick Wilson and producer Colin Rieser. Together, they’ve managed teams that have created visual works across multiple mediums and industries. [READ MORE] BLUE KITE CINEMA, LLC

Email: info@bluekitecinema.com

Phone: (609) 553-2503 Nick and Colin met in a band while studying music in college. Music has always been at the forefront of their friendship, business ventures, and storytelling aesthetic. Taking from their experience working on large-scale million-dollar commercials down to micro-budget short films, they’re thrilled to bring their debut feature film, Singing in My Sleep, to market. Our Work Celebrating the Season 2 premiere of Our Wedding Story. (EPs, 2019) BLUE KITE CINEMA, LLC

Email: info@bluekitecinema.com

Phone: (609) 553-2503 BLUE KITE CINEMA is an award-winning film and commercial production company from the tag-team duo of writer-director NICK WILSON and producer COLIN RIESER. Together, they’ve managed teams that have created visual works across multiple mediums and industries. Their ability to shape a project’s vision in every step of the production process has made them an invaluable asset to countless businesses and networks.

Recently, they served as Series Creators and Executive Producers for the first two seasons of the straight-to-series award-winning documentary show, Our Wedding Story, for the cable network UPtv. They traveled the globe crafting captivating and emotional episodes and still came in under-budget each season for the production. Transplant short film, 2019 WATCH FILM When their youngest son is in need of a heart transplant, Maggie forces Jacob to have the difficult conversation of whether or not they should pursue the risky surgery.

Filmed in a continuous 12-minute shot. PRODUCER, WRITER, DIRECTOR, EDITOR Back to Projects Our Wedding Story CREATOR, SHOWRUNNER Back to Projects In this award-winning docuseries on UPTV, viewers get to live each couple's love story with exceptional and passionate storytelling, from the very moment they met to their walk down the aisle.

Won telly awards for "Best Cinematography in a TV Series" and "Best Overall Documentary Series" UPTV series, two seasons Watch Episode View Program Back to Projects BKC developed this program alongside the team of the multinational corporation, Beachbody. They also assembled the team, directed, filmed, and edited over 30 videos on a studio stage in New York City as part of the program package. PRODUCER, DIRECTOR Beachbody, content series (20 videos) 2B Mindset Back to Projects BKC produced, filmed, edited, and composed music for this international commercial spot for Beachbody's dance workout program. The full 30-minute spot was the #1 Infomercial for 4 months, and is still running internationally seven years later. long-form tv commercial PRODUCER, DIRECTOR, EDITOR CIZE Back to Projects LG approached BKC to produce and direct the content for their Sing with LG campaign, featuring Charlie Puth. The team filmed the entire ad on the new LG V30 phone. advertisement PRODUCER, DIRECTOR Sing with LG FEAT. CHARLIE PUTH Forgetful Bats short film, 2020 Coping with quarantine is hard enough. It's even more difficult when you're a vampire with short-term memory loss.

Filmed by an all-roommate cast and crew at their home during the COVID quarantine. NEW FILM WRITER, DIRECTOR, EDITOR Back to Projects Dad Moments PRODUCER, WRITER, DIRECTOR, EDITOR short film, 2015 DAD MOMENTS is a short film inspired by a Reddit post about a woman who is sent on a scavenger hunt by her late father, which triggers flashbacks to specific memories of their relationship. Back to Projects Back to Projects BKC Produced, Directed & Edited various social media clips for Sofia Vergara to promote her Walmart exclusive Sofia Jeans 2020 clothing line. social assets PRODUCER, DIRECTOR, EDITOR Sophia Vegara x Walmart GET IN TOUCH nick@imakesound.com

@imakesound

fb.com/imakesound

609-553-2503

Drop me a line through your prefered method of millennial communication. Feel free to share any project ideas or recommendations for taco trucks!
